item.title: Day 3: Keep a Changelog
item.description: This article is part of my #100DaysOfCode and #100DaysOfBlogging challenge. R1D3 Today I was working with keep a changelog, especially with Matthew Weier O’Phinney’s implementation of it. I am fascinated by the idea of managing the CHANGELOG from the command line. Installation Setup is thanks to composer straight-forward. You can either install it locally or globally. I went with the latter. composer global require phly/keep-a-changelog If you haven’t already, remember to add the global composer bin path to your PATH environment variable.
